column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 3.3 Mapping documents onto a multilingual
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading2

column2: classification scheme
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column left-indent right-indent indented-line shorter-tail headchar-lower above-double-space above-line-space

column2: For the semantic mapping of news articles, we
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent hanged-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: use an existing system developed by Pouliquen et
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower

column2: al. (2003), which maps documents onto a multilin-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: gual thesaurus called Eurovoc. Eurovoc is a wide-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: coverage classification scheme with approximately
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line

column2: classes has exactly one translation in the currently
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 22 languages for which it exists. The system car-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line numbered-heading1 tailchar-hiphen

column2: ries out category-ranking classification using Ma-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: chine Learning methods. In an inductive process, it
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: builds a profile-based classifier by observing the
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: manual classification on a training set of docu-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ments with only positive examples. The outcome
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of the mapping process is a ranked list of the 100
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: independent of the text language so that it is very
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: culation, as was shown by Pouliquen et al. (2003).

column2: 4 Clustering of news articles
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading1 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: In this process, larger groups of similar articles
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: are grouped into clusters. Unlike in document clas-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: sification, clustering is a bottom-up, unsupervised
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: process, because the document classes are not
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: known beforehand.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period column-bottom

column2: 4.1 Building a dendrogram
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column right-indent column-top numbered-heading2 above-double-space above-line-space

column2: In the process, we build a hierarchical clustering
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: tree (dendrogram), using an agglomerative algo-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: rithm (Jain et al. 1999). In a first step, (1) we cal-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: culate the similarity between each document pair
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: in the collection (i.e. one full day of news in one
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: language), applying the cosine formula to the
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: document vector pairs. The vector for each single
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: document consists of its keywords and their log-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: likelihood values, enhanced with the country pro-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: file as described in sections 3.1 and 3.2. (2) When
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: two or more documents have a cosine similarity of
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 90% or more, we eliminate all but one of them as
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line

column2: we assume that they are duplicates or near-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: duplicates, i.e. they are exact copies or slightly
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: amended versions of the same news wire. (3) We
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: then combine the two most similar documents into
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: a cluster, for which we calculate a new representa-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line itemization headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: tion by merging the two vectors into one. For the
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: node combining the two documents, we also have
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: an intra-cluster similarity value showing the degree
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: to which the two documents are similar. For the
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: rest of the clustering process, this node will be
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: treated like a single document, with the exception
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: that it will have twice the weight of a single docu-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ment when being merged with another document
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: or cluster of documents. We iteratively repeat steps
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: (1) and (3) so as to include more and more docu-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line itemization tailchar-hiphen

column2: ments into the binary dendrogram until all docu-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ments are included. The resulting dendrogram will
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: have clusters of articles that are similar, and a list
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: of keywords and their weight for each cluster. The
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: degree of similarity for each cluster is shown by its
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: intra-cluster similarity value.
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space
